fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm the LCD updater runs in embedded mode
fields.request_details:
1. On an LCD-capable node that already has lcd-<service> units installed, upgrade to the build that defaults to embedded service management.
2. After the upgrade restarts the suite, run `journalctl -u <service> -n 40 --no-pager` and confirm `service-start.sh` logs `Skipping systemd-managed LCD service because embedded mode is enabled. Reinstall with --systemd to manage the LCD via systemd.`
3. Execute `systemctl list-unit-files | grep lcd-<service>` and verify no lcd-<service>.service units remain enabled when embedded mode is active.
4. Run `ps aux | grep -F

` and confirm exactly one LCD updater process is running under the service account.
5. Reinstall the node with `--systemd --lcd-screen` and ensure the lcd-<service>.service unit is recreated while the embedded process is no longer spawned during `./service-start.sh`.
